mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notices (title, content, author, created_date) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardAuthor}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notices ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset};
mapper.update: UPDATE notices SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, author, created_date, updated_date FROM notices WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, content, author, created_date, updated_date FROM notices ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};
